title: Sewing & Quilting
description: Creating beautiful handmade items, from quilts to bags and home decor.
details: Hand-pieced and machine quilts with intricate designs
Custom bags and purses for everyday use
Decorative baskets and storage solutions
Home decor items and seasonal decorations
Upcycling and repurposing fabric into new creations
Exploring traditional and modern quilting techniques

title: Cat Companionship
description: Sharing my life and workspace with two amazing feline coding assistants.
details: Butters: While he sleeps on the job, he makes a pretty awesome cat nap buddy
Margie: Occassionally joins me for meetings and provides moral support
Learning about cat behavior and enrichment activities
Creating DIY cat toys, blankets and apparel
Photography sessions capturing their unique personalities

title: Creative Projects
description: Various crafting and DIY projects that spark creativity and problem-solving.
details: Created my own party favor bags with stickers of my cats for my wedding party (it was a real hit too!)
Creating digital Art in GIMP and animation in OpenToonz is my favorite digital hobby outside of programming
Sewing and quilting handmade items for personal use and gifts

title: Continuous Learning
description: Always exploring new technologies, techniques, and creative pursuits.
details: Following tech blogs and development communities: Reddit, Dev.to, Hacker News
Experimenting with new programming languages and frameworks, like Unity and C#
Online courses in design, UX, and emerging technologies, freecodecamp.org is a favorite
Reading about best practices in software development, Software Architecture: The Hard Parts and React Key Concepts are a couple of my go-to books
Participating in coding challenges and hackathons
Geeking out with my friend Sam who is also an engineer that understands and shares my passion for all things tech
